formula: The map is: n -> if n mod 3 = 0 then 2*n/3 elif n mod 3 = 1 then (4*n-1)/3 else (4*n+1)/3.
maple: G := proc(n) option remember; if n = 0 then 8 elif 4*G(n-1) mod 3 = 0 then 2*G(n-1)/3 else round(4*G(n-1)/3); fi; end; [ seq(G(i),i=0..80) ];f:=proc(N) local n;if N mod 3 = 0 then 2*(N/3);elif N mod 3 = 2 then 4*((N+1)/3)-1; else4*((N+2)/3)-3; fi; end; (from _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 04 2011]
